assessments.status_rationale: No report of the U.S. 2-year Treasury closing at or below 4.10% in today’s news; deadline remains in the future.
No ICE BofA High Yield OAS print cited; nothing confirms a close at or above 4.00% yet and the deadline is still ahead.
No Henry Hub settlement levels were mentioned today; outcome remains unresolved before the November deadline.
Coverage did not include ETH price levels; no evidence of a $4,000+ UTC close.
The September Core PCE print is scheduled for 2025-10-31; no release yet.
Eurostat’s October 2025 HICP flash is not yet out; today’s news offers no figures.
No EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report indicating a 6+ million barrel build was referenced; deadline not reached.
No announcement from Google about cutting the standard U.S. Play fee to 20% or lower appeared in today’s coverage.
No App Store ranking data provided; the observation window just began and requires multiple days of evidence.
Reports mention participants joining talks, but there is no jointly endorsed ceasefire framework acknowledged by both parties and Egypt.
No Freddie Mac PMMS reading cited at or below 6.40%; outcome remains open through November.
No Drewry WCI Shanghai–New York update relative to the 2025-09-05 baseline was reported today.
